en.title: Cookies
en.info: A cookie is a small piece of data that’s stored on your computer, tablet, or phone when you visit a website. Most websites need cookies to work properly.
en.measureHow: measure how you use the service so it can be updated and improved based on your needs
en.rememberNotifications: remember the notifications you’ve seen so that you’re not shown them again
en.temporarilyStore: temporarily store the answers you give
en.howCookiesAreUsed: How cookies are used in this service
en.ga1: We use Google Analytics software to collect information about how you use this service. We do this to help make sure the service is meeting the needs of its users and to help us make improvements, for example improving site search.
en.ga4: how long you spend on each page
en.ga5: how you got to the service
en.ga6: what you click on while you’re visiting the service
en.ga7: We allow Google to use or share our analytics data. You can find out more about how Google use this information in their privacy policy.
en.ga8: You can opt out of Google Analytics if you do not want Google to have access to your information.
en.ga9: Google Analytics sets the following cookies:
en.gaCookie1_desc: This helps us count how many people visit the service by tracking if you’ve visited before
en.gaCookie2_desc: Manages the rate at which page view requests are made
en.toStoreAnswers: To store the answers you’ve given during your visit (known as a ‘session’)
en.sessionCookiesAreStored: Session cookies are stored on your computer as you travel through a website, and let the website know what you’ve seen and done so far. These are temporary cookies and are automatically deleted a short while after you leave the website.
en.sessionCookie_desc: Carries details of your current session
en.toIdentifyYouWhen: To identify you when you come back to the service
en.weUseAuthenticationCookies: We use authentication cookies to identify you when you return to the service.
en.toMakeServiceMoreSecure: To make the service more secure
en.weSetCookiesWhichPrevent: We set cookies which prevent attackers from modifying the contents of the other cookies we set. This makes the service more secure and protects your personal information.
en.stateCookie_desc: Identifies you to the service and secures your authentication
en.languageCookie_desc: Your language selection: English or Welsh
en.preferencesCookie_desc: Specifies if cookie preferences are set
en.dynatrace1: We use Dynatrace Software Intelligence Platform to provide an Application Performance Monitoring Service to collect information about how you use HMCTS services. We do this to monitor HMCTS services in order to resolve issues within our services as well as collect data on how our services can be improved. HMCTS store information about:
en.dynatrace2: Information is presented within the Application Performance Monitoring service for the purposes detailed above. We do not use or share the information for any other purpose. We do not allow Dynatrace to use or share the information for any other purposes.
en.dnCookie1_desc: Tracks a visit across multiple request
en.dnCookie2_desc: Measures server latency for performance monitoring
en.dnCookie3_desc: Required to identify proper endpoints for beacon transmission; includes session ID for correlation

cy.title: Cwcis
cy.info: Darn bach o ddata sy’n cael ei storio ar eich cyfrifiadur, eich tabled neu eich ffôn symudol pan fyddwch yn ymweld â gwefan yw cwci. Mae angen cwcis ar y rhan fwyaf o wefannau i weithio’n iawn.
cy.thisServiceUsesThemTo: Mae’r gwasanaeth hwn yn eu defnyddio i:
cy.measureHow: fesur sut ydych yn defnyddio’r gwasanaeth fel y gallwn ei wella a’i ddiweddaru ar sail eich anghenion
cy.rememberNotifications: cofio’r hysbysiadau rydych wedi’u gweld fel na fyddwch yn eu gweld eto
cy.temporarilyStore: storio’r atebion a roddwch dros dro
cy.howCookiesAreUsed: Sut ydym yn defnyddio cwcis yn y gwasanaeth hwn
cy.toMeasureWebsiteUsage: I fesur faint o bobl sy’n defnyddio ein gwefan
cy.ga1: Rydym yn defnyddio meddalwedd Google Analytics i gasglu gwybodaeth am sut rydych yn defnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn. Rydym yn gwneud hyn i helpu i sicrhau bod y gwasanaeth yn diwallu anghenion defnyddwyr ac i’n helpu i wneud gwelliannau, er enghraifft gwella’r cyfleuster chwilio.
cy.ga2: Mae Google Analytics yn storio gwybodaeth am:
cy.ga3: y tudalennau yr ydych yn ymweld â hwy
cy.ga4: faint o amser y byddwch yn ei dreulio ar bob tudalen
cy.ga5: sut y daethoch o hyd i’r gwasanaeth
cy.ga6: yr hyn rydych chi’n clicio arno wrth ddefnyddio’r gwasanaeth
cy.ga7: Rydym yn caniatáu i Google ddefnyddio neu rannu ein data dadansoddi. Gallwch ddarganfod mwy am sut mae Google yn defnyddio’r wybodaeth hon yn eu polisi preifatrwydd.
cy.ga8: Gallwch os nad ydych eisiau i Google gael mynediad at eich gwybodaeth.
cy.ga9: Mae Google Analytics yn gosod y cwcis canlynol:
cy.gaCookie1_desc: Mae hyn yn ein helpu i gyfrif faint o bobl sy’n ymweld â’r gwasanaeth drwy olrhain os ydych wedi ymweld o’r blaen
cy.gaCookie2_desc: Rheoli faint o bobl sy’n ymweld â’r dudalen
cy.gaCookie3_desc: Gadael i’r gwasanaeth wybod pwy ydych chi
cy.toStoreAnswers: Storio’r atebion a roesoch yn ystod eich ymweliad (gelwir hyn yn ‘sesiwn’)
cy.sessionCookiesAreStored: Caiff cwcis sesiwn eu storio ar eich cyfrifiadur wrth ichi fynd drwy wefan, ac maent yn gadael i’r wefan wybod beth rydych wedi’i weld a’i wneud hyd yn hyn. Cwcis dros dro yw’r rhain ac fe’u dilëir yn awtomatig ychydig ar ôl ichi adael y wefan.
cy.sessionCookie_duration: Pan fyddwch chi’n cau eich porwr
cy.toIdentifyYouWhen: Eich adnabod pan fyddwch yn dod yn ôl at y gwasanaeth
cy.weUseAuthenticationCookies: Rydym yn defnyddio cwcis dilysu i’ch adnabod pan fyddwch yn dod yn ôl at y gwasanaeth.
cy.authCookie_desc: Gadael i’r gwasanaeth wybod pwy ydych chi
cy.authCookie_duration: Pan fyddwch chi’n cau eich porwr
cy.toMakeServiceMoreSecure: Gwneud y gwasanaeth yn fwy diogel
cy.weSetCookiesWhichPrevent: Rydym yn gosod cwcis er mwyn rhwystro hacwyr rhag addasu cynnwys y cwcis eraill a osodon ni. Mae hyn yn gwneud y gwasanaeth yn fwy diogel ac yn diogelu eich gwybodaeth bersonol.
cy.tamperingCookie_duration: Pan fyddwch chi’n cau eich porwr
cy.stateCookie_desc: Gadael i’r gwasanaeth wybod pwy ydych chi a diogelu eich manylion
cy.stateCookie_duration: Pan fyddwch chi’n cau eich porwr
cy.languageCookie_desc: Eich dewis iaith: Cymraeg neu Saesneg
cy.preferencesCookie_desc: Specifies if cookie preferences are set
cy.dynatrace1: We use Dynatrace Software Intelligence Platform to provide an Application Performance Monitoring Service to collect information about how you use HMCTS services. We do this to monitor HMCTS services in order to resolve issues within our services as well as collect data on how our services can be improved. HMCTS store information about:
cy.dynatrace2: Information is presented within the Application Performance Monitoring service for the purposes detailed above. We do not use or share the information for any other purpose. We do not allow Dynatrace to use or share the information for any other purposes.
cy.dnCookie1_desc: Tracks a visit across multiple request
cy.dnCookie2_desc: Measures server latency for performance monitoring
cy.dnCookie3_desc: Required to identify proper endpoints for beacon transmission; includes session ID for correlation
